text: Chug a whole bottle of water
Sing a song
Tell everyone about your first crush
Call your parent(s) and say you love them
Make a frog sound
Spin until you are dizzy
Do a lap around the building
Attempt a handstand
Do 20 pushups
Get up from lying on your stomach with your hands behind your back
Go on instagram live for 5 minutes
Text your most recent ex
Burp the alphabet
Talk without closing your mouth for 5 minutes
Prank call someone
Eat a whole piece of paper
Touch your elbow to your toe
Lick the bottom of your shoe
Kneel for 10 minutes
Give yourself a tattoo with a marker
